casebody.data:
Giles W. WITHERSPOON, Appellant
v.
Jack SOMMERS, Superintendent, S.C.I. Waymart, et al. and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees No. 50 MAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 21 st day of September, 2018, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED .
